alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 23 at 2:06PM MDT until October 24 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...South Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
